COMBINED EXPERIENCE

Learn about our services

"Advertising doesn't work!"

How often have you heard that? We know it’s important for your business to have the right people managing your advertising and marketing needs in order for you to see the results you're looking for. Our clients rely on our expert advice to steer them in the right direction and make sure their approach is cutting edge.

That's why we provide an array of services to help you reach your target audience and meet your marketing goals.

We provide market research for our clients with access to Comscore Ratings and Research, Nielsen Ratings and Research, Rentrak, Sqad, and Scarborough. We can also provide you with the most current information available in the digital and mobile advertising arenas.

Television

TV advertising conveys your brand’s products and messages to a large audience. Local opportunities within each market are available based on relevant content such as local news, sports, cable programs, talk radio and major broadcast company primetime shows.

Radio

Promoting your business on popular radio stations can help you reach new people that may have never heard of your business or product before. You can choose the time of day that best fits the demographic that you're looking for.

Social Media

Every brand needs a social media presence these days. From Facebook, to Instagram, to LinkedIn, we create organic and paid posts that connect with your audience and perfectly convey your

brand's messaging.

OTT + CTV

Over-the-Top Television and Connected TV are two ways to reach homes across several devices and screens. These streaming options offer data-driven layering that targets specific individuals with audience data.

SEM + SEO

Feeling like a ghost on Google? SEO maximizes the numbers of visitors to websites by ensuring the site appears high on the list of results. SEM makes it possible to serve ads at the top of Google searches.

Digital Display

Digital display ads are banner ads embedded within popular websites. These ads may be used to target users based on geographical location, events, retargeting, keywords, and website visitors.

Reputation Management

Google Reviews are now the benchmark for a business’s reputation for internet users. Reputation management is a continuous process that allows you to stay on top of your brand’s public perception and address possible damaging situations as soon as they occur.

Print + Outdoor

Need help with tangible marketing items that you can leave with clients? We can help you create one pagers, flyers, billboards, or any other collateral you may need to spread the word about your business.

"Thi manages all of our advertising buys and it’s one of the few parts of my business that I don’t have to worry about. Thi negotiates a much better rate up front and then audits the stations to make sure they have delivered the level of advertising ratings that was promised. I only wish I could have Thi run other aspects of my business.”

Rebel Snodgrass – President of All American Exteriors
